Class SquareSparseMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • SquareSparseMatrix

  • public class SquareSparseMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for storing and operating on sparse two dimensional matrices. Note: A HashSet or TreeSet would be more efficient, but these aren't covered until ch. 8.
